  Maintain it small and actionable; keep automerge guidance in CI/workflows/docs.
-->

# Summary

Provide a concise description of the change and why it was made.

### Related tickets / issues

If this PR closes or relates to any issues, mention them here (e.g. closes #123).

---

### Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Chore / tooling
- [ ] Infrastructure / CI

---

### PR checklist (required before merging)
- [ ] I have read the repository contribution guidelines in `CONTRIBUTING.md`.
- [ ] The change passes local tests (run unit/integration tests where applicable).
- [ ] Linting and static checks pass (or new failures are documented with reasons).
- [ ] I added or updated tests for new behavior (if applicable).
- [ ] I added or updated documentation where appropriate (README, docs, or in-code comments).
- [ ] Any external secrets or credentials were NOT added to this PR.
- [ ] I added a short note for release notes / changelog (if applicable).
- [ ] I have added the label `automerge` only when the PR is safe to auto-merge and reviewers have approved (see repo policy).

---

### How to test / QA steps
Provide concrete steps to reproduce and verify the change. Include commands, URLs, or expected output.

### Notes for reviewers
Any special notes for reviewers (areas to focus on, potential risks, migration notes).

### Release note (optional)
Short description for changelog/release notes.
